name: Way of My Earth
description:
(A.) Way of My Earth

Short story of my being on the perfect planet...'

Perfectly modernized by the way. That's what I'mean ;P

Standard of action/adventure genre with pieces of survival/aRPG. More content needed? Tell me more ! More oponents? More level details? Or maybe some voiceacting with storyline? Possibly, of corse, but for now it's FULL'y playable and any customizations and/or updates you can easly see like a bonus bytes incoming to your hard drive! Game is almost finished! More play, more fun!


Really news:

Little update is coming in minutes. Havin some problems with .LUA scripts and creatures goes too early to bed...

Next:

Voice-acting, more attention for storyline and pumping up everything two times more than now. Don't understand? Trying to keep fast loading without any errors and/or bugs giving you what you like so much.. ;)
